Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, excellent location, and fantastic staff”
Reviews.Author: DSBLUEMOUNTAIN
Reviews.Content: ascott wifes significant birthday staff extremely helpful including booking stay stay memorable location excellent near eiffel tower viewing tower night recommend hotel hesitation

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel”
Reviews.Author: Maureennn
Reviews.Content: location stones throw metro trocedero eiffel tower excellent service nice paris standards junior suite bathroom clean separate bathtub shower stall bathroom comfortable alot walking shopping

Reviews.Title: “Good Service & Oustanding Location”
Reviews.Author: Alice S
Reviews.Content: location close paris 10 minutes walking distance champs elysees close palais de chaillot eiffel tower arc de easy access metro spite looking building atmosphere experience nicely designed service plenty space inside comfort feeling slept nice easy feeling

Reviews.Title: “Best hotel I've stayed at in Paris”
Reviews.Author: snowman40
Reviews.Content: ive stayed hotels arc de triomphe paris offered night ok astounding cristal champs elyssees found ascott looked ok photos price arrived pretty late dinner didnt experience truly excellent building oldish inside modern stylish 11 reception helpful polite quickly floor floors carpeted deep vivid scarlet carpet funky plastic chairs corridors corner door thinking tiny cupboard truth opposite huge paris standards length windows length powered curtains floor ceiling bang olufsen tv hifi bed 3 pillows bathroom bath separate shower unit bath plenty pressure fitted wide sliding doors luxuriate bath doors liked plenty space cupboards desks thick red carpet extended free wifi paris ive found bed proved comfy slept morning pleasant buffet breakfast overlooking smallish gym looked plenty hotel stay believe theres pool trip chance investigate overall highly impressive hotel paris reasonable price time im staying excellent

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic location, great accommodation and service”
Reviews.Author: MichelleGoldCoast
Reviews.Content: returned european vacation stayed numerous hotels apartments hotel favourite location surpassed modern clean service example finding air conditioning management arranged mechanic look half hour organised upgrade immediately found fixed short term organised photocopying travel documents issue accommodation stay paris wonderful

Reviews.Title: “Decent but I do not think it is worth the price I paid.”
Reviews.Author: jdanielca
Reviews.Content: paid premier 290 320 eur tax recently changed ascott brand shambles reservations supposed prepaid authorized card check time harm time getting king sized bed idea 2 changes idiots 3rd supposedly upgrade correct king sized bed money expect clean reasonable condition dated faucets fittings etc huge getting upgrade paid happy overall ok expect mentioned check pain paid stay pinch

HotelInfo.Name: Ascott Arc de Triomphe Paris
HotelInfo.Address: 81 Avenue Kleber | 16 Arr., 75016 Paris, France (Formerly Hotel Costes K)
